name: ts-for-gir-dbus-example
description: GJS example showing how to build a DBus server/client

scripts.build:types: npm run ts-for-gir -- generate Gio-2.0 -e gjs --useNamespace -t esm
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:app
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:server
scripts.validate: npm run validate:types && npm run validate:app
